server.label: Server Proxy
server.description: Uses this application's server to fetch data. Recommended, more reliable.

clientProxy.label: Client-Side Proxy
clientProxy.description: Uses a public CORS proxy in your browser. May be less reliable or rate-limited.

clientProxy.helper: Performance and reliability vary between proxies.

autoExtract.label: Automatic Extraction
autoExtract.description: Extract tags automatically after pasting/typing a valid URL.
autoExtract.tooltip: Enable or disable automatic tag extraction upon pasting/typing a valid URL

previews.label: Enable Previews
previews.description: Show image/video previews during extraction and in history.
previews.tooltip: Enable or disable image/video previews to save bandwidth or avoid potential issues
previews.note: Images are always fetched via the Server Proxy.

saveHistory.label: Save History
saveHistory.description: Store successful extractions locally in your browser.
saveHistory.tooltip: Enable or disable saving extraction history to your browser's local storage

unsupportedSites.label: Enable for Unsupported Sites
unsupportedSites.description: Try to extract from unsupported sites using similar site patterns. May not work for all sites.
unsupportedSites.tooltip: Enable extraction for unsupported websites by using similar site patterns

blacklist.label: Enable Keyword Blacklist
blacklist.description: Enter keywords to block, separated by commas, semicolons, or new lines.
blacklist.tooltip: Block unwanted tags by filtering out specific keywords

historySize.label: Maximum History Size
historySize.description: Set the max number of entries for both extraction and image history.

support.title: Support & Feedback
support.description: Found a bug or have a suggestion? Let us know!
